title: Keycloak 26.0.0 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Keycloak-admin-client should work with the future versions of Keycloak server    admin/client-java  * Make the organization chapter of Server Admin guide available on downstream   BUGS   * Broken Promise implementation for AuthZ JS adapter/javascript  * Allow increasing wait time on each failure after the max number of failures    is reached authentication  * ClassNotFoundException OracleXADataSource/OracleDataSource using IDELauncher    with Keycloak 26.0.0 dist/quarkus  * Client Scope updates are not replicated on a distributed keycloak setup in    kubernetes admin/api  * CVE-2021-44549 - org.eclipse.angus/angus-mail: Enabling Secure Server    Identity Checks for Safer SMTPS Communication dist/quarkus  * keycloak.v2 registration: Password policy validation error "errorList is    null" login/ui  * LDAP Pagination not working for role membership in    GET_ROLES_FROM_USER_MEMBEROF_ATTRIBUTE strategy ldap  * Listing federated LDAP users is very slow with import enabled ldap  * java.util.ConcurrentModificationException when process user sessions update    infinispan  * LDAP: searching users with import disabled is slower since fix for 34050 ldap
